description: Sadie Stein, Deputy Editor of The Paris Review, witnesses the birth of a new typographic symbol – a sort of ampersand for the word ‘the’- which may be headed to a keyboard near you.

teaser: Sadie Stein, Deputy Editor of The Paris Review, witnesses the birth of a new typographic symbol – a sort of ampersand for the word ‘the’- which may be headed to a keyboard near you.
title: When Writing Out ‘The’ is Just Too Much…
